articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects Power Station and Cooperative Farm
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects Power Station and Cooperative Farm
 Pyongyang, November 7 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il gave field guidance to the newly-built Kuchang Youth Power Station on the Kumjin River and the Tongbong Co-op Farm in Hamju County. 
					The first leg of his guidance was the newly-built Kuchang Youth Power Station on the Kumjin River.
					
					After being briefed on the power station before a map showing its panoramic view, he looked round the generator room, dam and other places of the power station to acquaint himself in detail with the construction, technical equipment and the production of electricity.
					
					Saying that the Kumjin River whose water flowed unused has turned into a river bringing happiness to the people and a river harnessed for producing electricity, he expressed great satisfaction over the fact that another splendid structure in the era of Songun was built in Jongphyong County.
					
					Great structures are towering in every part of the country one after another this year which witnesses radical turns thanks to the do-or-die fighting spirit of the people who flatten at one go even a high mountain and empty even a sea, when requested by the WPK to do so, bringing joy and confidence to the people, he said, adding that this breath in the stirring times is an expression of the inexhaustible mental power of the people to build a thriving nation at any cost by their own efforts and with locally available resources.
					
					He looked at the book recording the shining feats performed by members of the Kumjingang Youth Shock Brigade in Jongphyong County over the past 20 years since its organization and a collection of poems written by them and listened some of the many beautiful stories among young people, highly praising them for having made their worthwhile youth-hood rewarding.
					
					He underlined the need to successfully operate the power station so that the population of the county may sufficiently benefit from it. 
					
					He had a photo session with the members of the youth shock brigade and other builders.
					
					Looking at substitute for firewood, feed for domestic animals and micro-organic fertilizer developed by the county itself, he learned in detail about the research and its use in the county and appreciated efforts made by leading officials in the county.
					
					The next leg of his guidance was the Tongbong Cooperative Farm in Hamju County.
					
					He went round various places including a mechanized workteam and a store for seed potato and saw varieties of crops produced by the farm to acquaint himself in detail with the farming this year.
					
					Feasting his eyes on many cozy modern houses at the foot of a mountain and a vast expanse of standardized fields, he said that the farm has turned into a model farm for farming on the east coast, a socialist land of bliss where all kinds of crops and fruits are harvested. He added that this epoch-making change that has taken place in the land of Tongbong is a striking proof of the advantages of the socialist rural economy system in the country based on collectivism.
					
					He repeatedly sent high appreciation and thanks to all members of the farm. He gave newly-produced tractors to it as gifts in recognition of the feats performed by it.
					
					The basic factor of the farm's rapid boost of the agricultural production in recent years was its thorough implementation of the policy of the green revolution, he said, underlining the need to continue dynamically pushing forward the work to introduce superior strains suited to the climatic and natural features of the farm by giving full play to the creative ingenuity of the officials and other agricultural workers.
					
					He said that the experience gained by different farms including the above-said farm clearly proves that the shortcut to satisfactorily settling the food shortage under the conditions of the country where the area of cultivated land is limited is to thoroughly implement the party's policy of double cropping. He called for further developing the double cropping to suit the topographical features on the basis of the above-mentioned success.
					
					Saying that a basic way of sharply increasing the grain production is to definitely boost the per-hectare yield, he stressed that to this end it is necessary to ceaselessly increase the production of organic composite fertilizer to steadily improve the fertility of soil and, at the same time, put farming on a scientific and technological basis as required by the Juche-oriented farming method.
					
					It is good for the farm to briskly conduct the work to turn the village into a socialist land of bliss, he noted, underlining the need to dynamically accelerate the rural construction in order to turn the farm into people's fairyland. 
					
					He was accompanied by Thae Jong Su, chief secretary of the South Hamgyong Provincial Committee of the WPK, Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the WPK and Pak Nam Gi and Jang Song Thaek, department directors of the C.C., WPK.

articles.title: Book and Picture Album Published
articles.content:
Book and Picture Album Published
Pyongyang, November 7 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Publishing House has recently brought out a book titled "Home of Life" and a picture album titled "Country for People".
					The book writes about the life of those who had come to the DPRK in search of justice and truth in the past and the life of their descendants. It stresses that the DPRK is the truly motherly bosom which embraces, rears and puts up those with love for the country and nation.
					
					The picture album graphically shows the reality of the DPRK where the happy and true life of the people comes into bloom under warm care of the peerlessly great men, President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Waste Heat Reusing Technology Developed
articles.content:
Waste Heat Reusing Technology Developed
Pyongyang, November 7 (KCNA) -- The Heat Engineering Research Institute under the State Academy of Sciences of the DPRK developed a new technology of reusing waste heat.
					The technology is a practical energy economizing one which makes it possible to raise efficiency of heat producers and heat exchangers by recovering heat energy of waste gas from heating furnaces and boilers and reusing it in combustion process.
					
					The existing waste heat recovering devices such as multitubular and tubular heat exchangers have not been widely used for a series of drawbacks such as low efficiency and high production cost.
					
					The institute succeeded in developing a new kind of heat exchanger by combining multitubular one harmoniously with tubular one.
					
					The new combination heat exchanger can heat air to 200-350 degrees centigrade.
					
					A factory has introduced the combination heat exchanger into a heating furnace to warm combustion air up to 280 degrees centigrade, thus increasing the combustion efficiency considerably compared with the existing ones while economizing a large amount of oil.
					
					The technology, the economic effectiveness of which has been proved by the users, was highly appreciated in the 24th National Scientific and Technological Festival.

articles.title: Ideology and Theory on Driving Force of Revolution in Songun Era
articles.content:
Ideology and Theory on Driving Force of Revolution in Songun Era
Pyongyang, November 7 (KCNA) -- The single-minded unity of revolutionary ranks is being strengthened as never before and tremendous changes are being made in the building of a great, prosperous and powerful nation in the DPRK.
					The epoch-making miracles and changes in the country prove the correctness of the ideology and theory of the Workers' Party of Korea on the driving force of the revolution in the Songun era.
					
					The Songun idea, on the exposition that the People's Army is the main force of the revolution, has further developed and enriched the principle of the Juche idea on the driving force of the revolution.
					
					The Juche idea elucidates that the driving force of the revolution consists not of mere masses but of the leader, Party and people and it is not a technical cohesion but an integral whole in which they are firmly united in an organizational way with one ideology and will and with moral obligation.
					
					The Songun idea expounds that the revolutionary army is the core unit of the popular masses and the powerful main force which pushes ahead with the revolution and construction in the van and that the army plays the kernel role in this unity.
					
					The principle of the Juche idea on the driving force of the revolution has developed in depth as a principle that it is the purest and solid integral whole of the popular masses centering on the Party and the leader with the army as nucleus. The reality has displayed its vitality to the full. 
					
					The people armed with the idea and spirit of the People's Army have nothing to fear even though they should undergo manifold trials like the "Arduous March" and forced march. It is the truth of history that the Korean people have grasped while waging a struggle with the Songun revolutionary theory of the WPK as the powerful weapon.
					
					The entire army and all the people of Korea will strive harder for the construction of a great, prosperous and powerful socialist country with the ideology and theory of the WPK on the driving force of the revolution in the Songun era as the treasured sword.

articles.title: DPRK Photo and Fine Art Exhibition Held in Turkey
articles.content:
DPRK Photo and Fine Art Exhibition Held in Turkey
Pyongyang, November 7 (KCNA) -- A DPRK photo and fine art exhibition was held with due ceremony in Turkey from Oct. 19 to Nov. 5.
					Displayed in the venue of the exhibition were photos and art pieces introducing the efforts of the people of the DPRK to accelerate the building of a thriving nation under the banner of Songun.
					
					Attending it were figures of political parties and organizations including the Workers' Party of Turkey and the Turkey-Korea Friendship Association and masses. On hand were the DPRK ambassador to Turkey and staff members of his embassy.
					
					Esin Ozbey, chairperson of the association, addressing the opening ceremony said that it would mark an important occasion in widely introducing to the Turkish people the drive of the people of the DPRK to build a thriving nation, while firmly defending socialism, rallied close around General Secretary Kim Jong Il, their high level of culture, wisdom and skills and contributing to the development of the friendly relations between the two countries.

articles.title: Meeting of Solidarity with Korean People Held in Belgium
articles.content:
eeting of Solidarity with Korean People Held in Belgium
Pyongyang, November 7 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held in Belgium on Oct. 30 on the occasion of the month supporting the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo.
					Displayed in the venue of the meeting were books and art pieces introducing the true appearance of Songun Korea.
					
					Speeches were made there.
					
					A member of the leadership of the Solidarity Committee "Korea Is One" of Belgium said that the DPRK is a symbol of victory and a banner of struggle of the world progressives for progress and justice.
					
					He expressed firm solidarity with the Korean people in their cause of achieving national reunification independently and peacefully.
					
					Paulette Pierson, honorary chairman of the International Liaison Committee for Reunification and Peace in Korea, noted that the proposal for founding the DFRK set forth by President Kim Il Sung is the most just one as it makes it possible to independently and peacefully reunify Korea.
					
					A member of the Solidarity Committee "Korea Is One" of Belgium said it is natural that the people in the DPRK have achieved signal successes in economic construction, renewing his determination to conduct dynamic activities for introducing the DPRK to the broad strata of people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige en terreno central Kuchang y granja Tongbong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige en terreno central Kuchang y granja Tongbong
Pyongyang, 7 de noviembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno la nuevamente construida Central Hidroelectrica Juventud de Kuchang del rio Kumjin y la Granja Cooperativa de Tongbong del distrito de Hamju.
					El estuvo primero en la Central Hidroelectrica Juventud de Kuchang del rio Kumjin.
					
					Luego de escuchar la explicacion ante el plano, hizo conocimiento detallado del estado de construccion, equipos tecnicos y produccion electrica recorriendo la sala de generador electrico, el dique y otros lugares de la central.
					
					Senalando que el Kumjin, que antes corria inutilmente, se convierte en el rio del paraiso y el "de electricidad", que hace feliz a los habitantes, se puso muy contento de que el distrito de Jongphyong haya construido magnificamente otra gran obra monumental de la epoca del Songun (priorizacion militar).
					
					Las grandes obras monumentales construidas una tras otra en varios lugares del pais en este ano, en que acontecen grandes sucesos gracias al espiritu de lucha de materializacion a ultranza del pueblo coreano que realiza hasta lo imposible si lo demanda el Partido del Trabajo de Corea, ponen felices y confiados a nuestros habitantes, subrayo.
					
					Destaco que tal aliento de la epoca conmovedora es la manifestacion de la inagotable fuerza espiritual del pueblo coreano decidido a construir sin falta una gran potencia prospera con sus fuerzas y recursos propios.
					
					Al ver la coleccion de datos, que ha anotado las orgullosas proezas realizadas por los miembros de la brigada juvenil de trabajo del rio Kumjin del distrito de Jongphyong durante 20 anos pasados despues de su fundacion, y la otra de poemas creados por ellos, y al escuchar numerosas anecdotas de sus conductas ejemplares, evaluo altamente la verdadera vida de ellos que pasan digna y valiosamente su juventud.
					
					Enseno que el distrito de Jongphyong debe operar bien la planta para que los habitantes locales se beneficien suficientemente de ella.
					
					El Dirigente se fotografio junto con los miembros de la brigada juvenil y otros constructores.
					
					El mismo dia, el Dirigente vio el combustible, piensos y abonos microbianos desarrollados por ese distrito con cuenta propia informandose concretamente de la investigacion y el uso de ellos y encomio los esfuerzos de los cuadros directivos del distrito.  
					
					A continuacion, el Dirigente estuvo en la Granja Cooperativa de Tongbong del distrito de Hamju.
					
					Tras visitar varios lugares como el equipo de trabajo para la mecanizacion y el deposito de semillas de patata, examino varias plantas agricolas producidas en la granja averiguando en detalles como marcharon las faenas agricolas de este ano.
					
					Al contemplar las modernas y confortables viviendas extendidas en una hilera al pie de la montana y la extensa llanura donde se pierden en el horizonte las parcelas bien estandarizadas, dijo que esta granja se ha convertido en la ejemplar en la agricultura de la zona costera del Mar Este y en un paraiso socialista donde se dan toda clase de cereales y frutas.
					
					Este cambio del siglo acontecido en la tierra de Tongbong comprueba bien la superioridad de la economia rural socialista de nuestro pais que tiene por su atributo fisiologico el colectivismo, asevero.
					
					Volvio a apreciar mucho los meritos de todos los granjeros y les expreso agradecimiento.
					
					Como reconocimiento de los meritos de la granja, regalo a ellos los tractores nuevamente fabricados. 
					
					El factor principal del brusco aumento de la produccion agricola en los ultimos anos en esta granja esta en la materializacion consecuente de la orientacion de producir una innovacion en el mejoramiento de semillas, apunto.
					
					Destaco la necesidad de seguir impulsando dinamicamente la introduccion de optimas variedades, que convengan al clima y las condiciones del suelo de la granja, haciendo buen uso de la creatividad de los funcionarios y los trabajadores agricolas.
					
					Las experiencias adquiridas en esta granja y las otras muestran bien que implementar cabalmente la orientacion del partido sobre dos cosechas al ano es el camino mas rapido para solucionar satisfactoriamente el problema de alimentos dado que en nuestro pais estan limitadas las areas cultivables, senalo y agrego que se debe desarrollar mas esa forma de cultivo basandose en tal exito y conforme a las caracteristicas zonales.
					
					El remedio fundamental para aumentar trascendentalmente la produccion de granos es elevar decisivamente el rendimiento por hectarea, acoto.
					
					Para ese fin, hay que mejorar constantemente la fertilidad de los arrozales y campos de secano mediante el incremento continuo de la produccion de abonos compuestos organicos y al mismo tiempo, labrar la tierra de manera cientifico-tecnica y segun los autoctonos metodos agricolas, agrego.
					
					Es muy loable que la granja este dinamizando las labores para acondicionar la aldea como paraiso socialista, dijo y continuo que se debe convertirla en el paraiso socialista mas acomodado mediante el dinamico impulso de la construccion rural.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion el secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Hamgyong del Sur, Thae Jong Su, el secretario del CC del PTC, Kim Ki Nam, y los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Pak Nam Gi y Jang Song Thaek.

articles.title: Publicados libro y album de pinturas
articles.content:
Publicados libro y album de pinturas
Pyongyang, 7 de noviembre (ATCC) -- Recientemente, la Editorial de Pyongyang publico el libro "Cuna de la vida" y el album de pinturas "Pais del pueblo".
					A traves de la narracion de la vida de los hombres, quienes pasaron a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en busca de justicia y verdad, y de sus descendientes, el libro muestra vividamente que la RPDC es el regazo maternal que abraza, forma y antepone a todos los hombres que aman a su patria y nacion.
					
					El album de pinturas describe la realidad de la RPDC donde el pueblo lleva una vida feliz y verdadera gracias al Presidente Kim Il Sung y al Dirigente Kim Jong Il, grandes hombres sin pares.

articles.title: Desarrollada nueva tecnica para re-uso de calor residual
articles.content:
Desarrollada nueva tecnica para re-uso de calor residual
Pyongyang, 7 de noviembre (ATCC) -- El Instituto de la Ingenieria Termica de la Academia Estatal de Ciencias de Corea desarrollo nueva tecnica para re-uso de calor residual.
					 Se trata de la eficiente tecnica de ahorro de energia que permite elevar la eficacia de las  instalacciones termicas al reusar en el proceso de combustion la energia termica del gas viciado que se engendra en el horno de calentar o la caldera.
					
					  Hasta ahora, se inventaron los aparatos de recogida de calor residual como cambiador de calor. Pero, no se utilizan ampliamente porque bajo la eficacia y es muy caro el precio de fabricacion. 
					
					  El instituto desarrollo el cambiador de calor de nuevo tipo al transformar los aparatos del pasado. 
					
					  Al utilizar nuevo cambiador es posible conseguir el aire limpio y caliente de 200-350o C.
					
					  Una fabrica, que introdujo este aparato en el horno de calentar, pudo elevar considerablemente la eficacia termica en comparacion con el pasado aun ahorrando mucho combustible por haber calentado hasta 280o C el aire para uso de combustion.
					
					  Esta tecnica fue apreciada en el 24o Festival Nacional de Ciencia y Tecnica.

articles.title: Idea y teoria originales sobre el sujeto de la revolucion
articles.content:
Idea y teoria originales sobre el sujeto de la revolucion
Pyongyang, 7 de noviembre (ATCC) -- Hoy dia, se fortalece considerablemente en Corea la unidad monolitica de las filas de la revolucion y se logran enormes cambios en la construccion de una gran potencia prospera.
					El milagro y el cambio seculares, que acontecen en esta tierra patria, comprueban claramente la justeza de la idea y teoria originales sobre el sujeto de la revolucion de la epoca del Songun (priorizacion militar), presentadas por el Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					
					La idea del Songun enriquecio el principio de la idea Juche sobre el sujeto de la revolucion a base de la aclaracion de que el Ejercito Popular es el grueso de la revolucion.
					
					Ese pensamiento aclaro que el sujeto de la revolucion no lo constituyen solo las simples masas, sino lo forman estas, el lider y el partido unidos firmemente en lo ideo-volitivo, organizativo y moral.
					
					Dilucido ademas que el ejercito revolucionario es la unidad nuclear de las masas populares y poderoso grueso que empuja al frente la revolucion y la construccion y juega el papel medular en lograr la unidad ideo-volitiva, organizativa y moral de las masas populares en torno al partido y al lider.
					
					Por eso, el principio de la idea Juche sobre el sujeto de la revolucion se profundizo como fundamento de que tal sujeto lo son las masas populares con el ejercito como su nucleo unidas pura y solidamente en torno al partido y al lider.
					
					Este fundamento muestra plenamente su vitalidad en la realidad.
					
					Si se arman con la idea y espiritu del ejercito popular, no hay nada que temer aunque lleguen cien veces los periodos tan dificiles como la "Marcha penosa" y la forzada. Esto es la verdad de la historia que aprendio el pueblo coreano en el proceso de luchar considerando la teoria revolucionaria del Songun del PTC como medio invencible.
					
					Todo el ejercito y todo el pueblo de Corea libraran con mas vigor la construccion de la gran potencia prospera socialista tomando como medio omnipotente la idea y la teoria sobre el sujeto de la revolucion de la epoca del Songun, presentadas por el partido.
